@RachaelCraw we are getting 4's... agree with you on the weather... I gave up and pulled the washing off the line.
@RachaelCraw How are you doing over there? We are waiting for the southerly to hit...
@suecopsey My child sitting maths this morning... Oh joy. All these little aftershocks... She shrugs them off. I'm always thinking ChCh!
@suecopsey Does this mean you can sneak in and do the exam...
@giselledraws Thats a comic right there! Maybe your luggage wanted to go to Fiji?
@suecopsey Ok clearly i was operating on cold war information... all those little stans....
@metlinkwgtn Thanks Guys and Gals... You are doing a great job!
@metlinkwgtn just checking... Your website says trains stopped between wellington and Petone... has that changed? Are the trains back on?
@giselledraws @philippa_werry at least you are thinking about it Giselle!
